alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 12:25PM CDT until July 08 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Northern DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near T O Fuller State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southaven, Germantown, Olive Branch, West Memphis, Horn Lake, Hernando, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Walls, Southwest Memphis, Lynchburg, Southeast Memphis, Whitehaven, Louise, Bright, Amanea, Nesbit, Wyandoke, Capleville and Presidents Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
